#summary brainstorming notes for controller

= Controller =

== General Notes ==
  * For a controller class of the name Controller_Foo, the name on the file system and used in code is Foo (Controller_ is dropped).



==the process method==

called as {{{public function process($action)}}}

  # set the template based on the $action
    * if $action is null look for default action (index.php)
    * else look for file /app/view/{controller}/{action}.php
